text: Kinta tara yadi bimukha haya tabe amara tomake to tadera upare ekajana raksakarirupe patha'i ni. Tomara upare to sudhu bani paumche de'oya. Ara abasya amara yakhana manusake amadera kacha eke karuna asbadana kara'i takhana se ete ananda kare, kinta tadera hata ya agabariyeche sejan'ya yadi kono manda tadera aghata kare, tabe manusa niscaya'i haye yaya akrtajna.
